segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout, with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area has the woman and the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It overflows steadily onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a step stool near the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches for the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is orderly through the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical domestic setting.
segments.speaker: PAR
